DOC.brief_summary: Guidance stenting IVUS propose method reduce restenosis rate , lumen stent dimension accurately determine intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Intravascular Ultrasound ( IVUS ) -Guided Chronic Total Occlusion Intervention With Drug-eluting Stents
DOC.detailed_description: Guidance stenting IVUS propose method reduce restenosis rate , lumen stent dimension accurately determine intravascular ultrasound ( IVUS ) . However , randomized study investigate strategy yield inconsistent result . Therefore , investigator hypothesize potential advantage IVUS guidance would apparent Chronic Total Occlusion ( CTO ) intervention try evaluate impact IVUS-guided chronic total occlusion intervention drug-eluting stent mid-term angiographic , IVUS clinical outcome .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient ≥ 20 year ≤ 80 year old 2 . On coronary angiography , complete obstruction coronary blood flow ( TIMI grade 0 ) estimate occlusion duration ≥ 3months . 3 . On coronary angiography , Reference vessel diameter 2.5 4.0mm operator assessment 4 . On coronary angiography , Total length total occlude lesion main lesion le 80mm lesion treat less 4 stent . 5 . Guide wire pass occluded lesion without complication 6 . Patients keep dual antiplatelet treatment ( aspirin , clopidogrel ) 6 month procedure 1 . Hypersensitivity reaction side effect Aspirin , Clopidogrel , Biolimus A9 Zotarolimus 2. unprotected Left main disease 3 . Cardiogenic shock LV ejection fraction ≤ 30 % 4 . Previous stent restenotic lesion 5 . Treated within 2 week lesion . 6 . Creatinine level ≥ 2.0 mg/dL ESRD 7 . Severe tortuous calcify lesion ( Unobtainable IVUS image ) 8 . Life expectancy < 1 year 9 . Severe hepatic dysfunction ( 3 time normal reference value ) 10 . Pregnant woman woman potential childbearing
